title: Was Cleopatra the prettiest woman in her time? - Quora

response.answer_text: No, she wasn’t. But the charms go a long way. That and being as powerful (or beyond) her brother/husband/pharao. Movies and other later depictions kind of degrades her charms to be all about beauty, but thing is she was actually a rather sharp power players for her gender and times - unfortunately it didn’t help her in the end.
Based on her profile on the coins she issued, she was no great beauty.
